nodes.text: The Nuro Pirates were a pirate gang on Felucia lead by Yorn Nuro. They supported the Confederacy of Independent Systems during the Third battle of Felucia and stole a Nysillin farm. They started supplying the Confederacy with the nysillin. During the battle, the famed Clone commando RC-1138 commissioned a Jedi Knight to defeat Yorn Nuro, which was successfully carried out. Captain Carg of Graul Company also ordered the Jedi Knight to eliminate some of the Nuro Pirates around the farm.
